function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for undetected outbreaks in confined subpopulations like schools, hospitals, and warehouses.","Impact":"Rapid outbreak clusters and overlooked new cases leading to widespread transmission of contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Targeted monitoring of key subpopulations and implementation of proactive testing and contact tracing protocols.","Technologies":"Diagnostic testing, wastewater-based epidemiology (WBE).","People":"Students, patients, workers, residents, and visitors in confined areas.","Owner":"Health agencies, facility managers, and local authorities."},{"Description":"Limitations of manufacturing and supply chains for diagnostic testing.","Impact":"Inability to conduct massive-scale testing and targeted monitoring due to high costs and logistical constraints.","Mitigation":"Improvement of manufacturing and supply-chain capabilities, development of cost-effective testing methods, and resource allocation planning.","Technologies":"Manufacturing technologies for diagnostic test kits, supply-chain management tools.","People":"Governments, private sector stakeholders, and healthcare organizations.","Owner":"Health ministries, industry leaders, and logistics teams."},{"Description":"Lack of data-driven strategy for reopening and closing economies during resurgence of outbreaks.","Impact":"Uncertain decision-making leading to potential resurgence of contagious diseases and economic instability.","Mitigation":"Development of data-driven strategies, predictive modeling, and real-time monitoring of epidemiological data.","Technologies":"Data analytics, predictive modeling, and surveillance technologies.","People":"Policy-makers, business owners, and the general population.","Owner":"Public health authorities, economic advisors, and policy development teams."}]}
